definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: High crosslink starch nearly didn't dissolve in boiled water and could sop up more water.
sentences.chinese: 高交联淀粉溶解性能降低，而吸水性能增强。

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解于甲醇并加入过量氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: If crystallization occurs, use water bath heating to dissolve it, which will not affect the performance of product.
sentences.chinese: 发生结晶时只需用水浴加热溶解，不影响使用效果。

sentences.english: The solubility of the resin depends on the critical balance of positively and negatively charged ions.
sentences.chinese: 树脂的溶解性取决于阴，阳离子的电平衡。

sentences.english: Huiquan Li, Jinshu Wang. Recycling and Reuse of Ionic Liquid in Homogeneous Cellulose Acetylation.
sentences.chinese: 蔗渣纤维素在离子液体中的溶解与再生。

sentences.english: They differ in solubility and chemical reactivity.
sentences.chinese: 它们在溶解度和化学反应活性上有差别。

sentences.english: Generally speaking , neither gold nor stone are soluble in water.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，金子和石头都不能溶解于水。

sentences.english: Soluble metallic hydroxides are bases that are alkalies .
sentences.chinese: 可溶解的金属氢氧化合物都是碱。

sentences.english: Moreover, new drugs are being developed that will prevent osteolysis and loss of bone.
sentences.chinese: 此外，正在研发预防骨溶解和骨丢失的各种新药。

sentences.english: The lysis of the brain takes place only hours after death.
sentences.chinese: 脑的细胞溶解，在死后的几小时就发生了。

sentences.english: It reviewed the progress on etiopathogenisis of non-traumatic rhabdomyolysis (NRML) patients and their nursing.
sentences.chinese: 综述了非创伤性横纹肌溶解症的病因及护理进展。

sentences.english: The sugar dissolved quickly in water.
Does dementia increase risk of thrombolysis?
sentences.chinese: 痴呆能否增加血栓溶解风险？
行星溶解，捏合机，三辊轧机。

sentences.english: Melt the gelatine powder with hot water. Stir into raspberry.
sentences.chinese: 鱼胶粉与热水调至溶解，拌入覆盆子液中。

sentences.english: In the choice to dissolve the armoring, the capacity to love again can be restored.
sentences.chinese: 在选择溶解装甲中，爱的能力能再次被恢复。

definition: to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
